Articles.Content:
I think it would be interesting in late game to have the option of something like electromagnetic mass drivers for resource transport out of colonies, especially on airless and/or low gravity worlds. 

Edited October 12, 2022 by GaussFlux
image messed with formatting.
good idea (i have nothing to add, someone else please add to this conversation)
Thats whats fusion and anti-matter are for...
